xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/840903-600 Stories That Have to Be Told 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/t0VBXEHNFDBi93oTMZa7DnwMTfa.jpg Interviews were conducted over a seven year period with 670 people who were deported to Siberia as children in 1941. Fragments of their memories form a mosaic revealing their past experiences of losing fathers, mothers, brothers and sisters. Time heals, but nothing is forgotten and the stories must be told. 600 Stories That Have to Be Told
